snippet: State health officials say one child died last week and 37 other people, including 22 children, were sickened in an E. coli outbreak tied to the Cleveland County Fair.
abstract: North Carolina state health officials say one child has died and 37 other people, including 22 children, were sickened in E coli outbreak tied to the Cleveland County Fair.
lead_paragraph: State health officials say one child died last week and 37 other people, including 22 children, were sickened in an E. coli outbreak tied to the Cleveland County Fair.

headline.main: North Carolina: E. Coli Outbreak that Killed One Is Tied to Fair
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: E. Coli Outbreak That Killed One Is Tied to Fair
